about_the_game:
Grimreach: Forsaken Echoes invites players into a haunting and surreal journey through a mysterious fortress shrouded in mist. As a forgotten soul trapped between life and death, you must explore this nightmarish realm to piece together fragments of memory and confront the terrifying manifestations of your own psyche. Every step brings you closer to the truth of who you were and what you’ve lost, but beware—the deeper you venture, the more distorted and hostile the world becomes.

This third-person rogue-like RPG offers a gripping blend of exploration and intense combat. As you gather scattered echoes of your past, you'll unlock powerful upgrades to face increasingly nightmarish foes. Each boss presenting unique challenges as you battle not only for survival but for self-discovery.

Key Features

  • Dynamic Rogue-like Gameplay: No two runs are the same. Engage in strategic combat, adapt to procedurally generated challenges, and evolve as you gather lost memories.
  • Rich character development: Collect memory echoes to gain strength, unlock new character abilities and uncover events of the past.
  • Customization and Tactics: Tailor your abilities and combat style to match your playstyle as you dive deeper into the fortress’ dark secrets.
  • Challenging Boss Battles: Face off against terrifying bosses that will test your wits and ability to withstand punishment.
  • Deep Lore: Discover the rich backstory of the fortress and its tragic inhabitants through environmental storytelling and cryptic encounters.

Are you ready to face your past and conquer the darkness within? Or will you become another forgotten echo, lost to the void?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Grimreach: Forsaken Echoes is a dark fantasy rogue-like RPG where players explore a forsaken fortress, collecting memory echoes and battling terrifying creatures. Each fight draws you deeper into the mystery of your forgotten past and closer to self-discovery.
